product_name: Nite Ize Gear Tie - 32 in. - 2 pack
long_description: The perfect size for organizational jobs in your campsite, home, or yard, the 32 in. Nite Ize Gear Tie bundles and organizes with a simple cinch and twist. Flexible, sturdy, bendable interior wire and a durable, waterproof rubberlike exterior make it endlessly versatile and useful. Great for securing uneven bundles of nearly every size. Use indoors and outdoors in any weather; waterproof and safe for use in fresh water or salt water without damage. Tough thermoplastic elastomer shell provides excellent grip yet won't scratch or mark; UV resistant design will not be damaged or destroyed by extended sun exposure. Strong wire inside holds its shape.
short_description: The perfect size for organizational jobs in your campsite, home, or yard, the 32 in. Nite Ize Gear Tie bundles and organizes with a simple cinch and twist.
